title: Enhancing Healthcare Practice Competency: Designing Reflective Practice and Dialogue-Based Learning for Multicultural Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational pedagogy and basic concepts of multicultural education
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can reflectively analyze their cultural backgrounds and biases in multicultural educational contexts
Learners can integrate diverse perspectives through collaborative dialogue with peers and propose educational implementation strategies
Learners can create and present multicultural education practice plans through project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
